subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Kimi Raikkonen won the Belgian Grand Prix for the third consecutive time, beating his Ferrari teammate Felipe Massa yesterday in Spa-Francorchamps in the first race since Formula One’s spy scandal. The world champion Fernando Alonso took third ahead of his McLaren teammate Lewis Hamilton after an opening corner duel, reducing Hamilton’s lead in the drivers’ standings to 2 points with three races left.
